title: Japanese Conversation Completion Quiz - Hard Mode
description: Complete the blanks in these Japanese conversation snippets. This quiz tests your ability to understand and use conversational Japanese effectively.
instructions: Type the appropriate word or phrase in Japanese using Romaji to complete the sentence.
The case (uppercase or lowercase) of your answer does not matter, as long as the spelling is correct.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for scoring.

items.question: Ano mise no _______ wa totemo oishii desu. (The cake from that shop is very delicious.)
Watashi no tomodachi wa _______ ni sunde imasu. (My friend lives in the countryside.)
Kanojo wa _______ o tsukuru no ga tokui desu. (She is good at making bread.)
Kare wa _______ ni tsuite benkyou shite imasu. (He is studying philosophy.)
Kono mise wa _______ made aite imasu. (This shop is open until late at night.)
Watashi wa _______ ni ikimasu. (I go to school by bicycle.)
Kanojo wa _______ ga totemo suki desu. (She really likes cats.)
Watashitachi wa _______ de eiga o mimashita. (We watched a movie at the cinema.)
Kare wa _______ no sensei desu. (He is a math teacher.)
Watashi no imouto wa _______ o benkyou shite imasu. (My sister is studying biology.)
